name: edhii
overview:
edhii.com is an e-learning marketplace and a knowledge platform that connects students/learners with global subject matter experts/instructors.

Instructors can create lessons and sell them at any price or offer them for free to market their expertise. A lesson or tutorial can consist of text, graphics, videos, or downloadable files. They can also create a course to organize their lessons and create their own community. A course can be: â€¢ Open: Anyone can instantly join this course; useful to showcase expertise, organize lessons, create a following, or offer a curriculum. â€¢ Semi-private: Memberships to the course have to be approved by course admins; useful to control who is able to join a course. â€¢ Private: Only course admins can invite members to join a course.Ideal for instructors and corporations who want members to join a course by invitation only.

Creating a lesson and course is free; we only charge 20% on the sale of a lesson.

Students can find lessons and courses created by global experts for all their learning needs at a price determined by the instructors themselves. They can also ask questions to the edhii community and instructors can respond with a lesson, either free or paid.

edhii provides various benefits to instructors: â€¢ Monetize years of experience and expertise. â€¢ Numerous tools to create a killer lesson â€“ text, graphics, videos, downloadable files. â€¢ Set any price. â€¢ Sell to a global community of learners.
